name: The Wild Eternal
description: Get lost beneath the fog in The Wild Eternal, a reflective first-person exploration game. Embark on a meditative journey to heal the scars of your past. Can you escape the cycle of reincarnation?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB Memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space
